EmailTemplate.name: 201908_ChannelWebinar_JetWave_August2019_kcr.201908_Channel Partner Webinar_JetW
EmailTemplate.subject: Catch the JetWave - Market Outlook, Sales Updates & Quoting Strategies To Know Before NBAA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Channel Partner, Our upcoming dealer webinar, Catch the JetWave: Market Outlook, Sales Updates & Quoting Strategies to Know Before NBAA, is only a week away! Join us on Tuesday, August 27th at 8:00 AM PST / 11:00 AM EST as Jim Skvarla, Honeywell's Senior Technical Sales Manager - Connectivity Products, leads a session covering the latest JetWave product and services information including:
- An Overview of the Connectivity Market and the Global JetWave Outlook - STC Updates - Tips for Solution Selling - Details on the Latest JetWave Incentives - Tools and Resources for Sales Enablement - Tips for Building a JetWave Quote
Following the webinar, we will host a live Q&A. If you can join us, please register today by clicking below.
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_Wi50y4_lSqSfNKDhYcRviQ]]>
This webinar is intended for Honeywell Channel Partners only, but please feel free to distribute to other members of your organization as you see fit. If this email was forwarded to you and you'd like to be notified about upcoming webinar events directly, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Channel-Partner-Webinars-Opt-In.html]]> to let us know!
